Subject: How I Lost 100 Pounds Without Being Miserable
Description: Jeff used to be really big, now he's not. Using a mixture of math, science, and personal story, he'll explain how he went from 280 lbs to 160 lbs in a little over a year and how you can too.  Speakers include:Jeffrey Quesnelle - Track: Life  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector

Subject: Are the Reals Really Real? A Skeptical Look at Infinity
Description: Infinity -- all of mathematics relies on it but its existence is a matter of faith. Come learn about how this pervasive mystery underpins everything we know about numbers. The foundations of math itself will be discussed, and you may leave wondering: are the real numbers really real?   Speakers include:Jeffrey Quesnelle, Zach Blagg - Track: Science  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: Projector
